tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE documentation_table ( 
  doc_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
  title VARCHAR(255), 
  content TEXT, 
  author VARCHAR(100), 
  created_at TIMESTAMP 
);

CREATE TABLE documentation (
    doc_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT NOT NULL,
    content TEXT,
    author TEXT,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE doc_tags (
    doc_id UUID,
    tag_id UUID,
    PRIMARY KEY (doc_id, tag_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (doc_id) REFERENCES documentation (doc_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (tag_id) REFERENCES tags (tag_id)
);

CREATE TABLE team_members (
    member_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name TEXT,
    email TEXT,
    team_id INT,
    role TEXT
);
